body:
This is needed to better support active CI efforts in the ECP Software Development Tools SDK.

@ilagunap The current version of this package does not match the one in https://github.com/LLNL/FPChecker/blob/master/fpc_spack_repo/packages/package.py. Should I submit a PR over there to update it and include the contents of this PR?
title: fpchecker: Add version for master branch
